names.fullName: 15N labeled glutamine-rich domain QA of Sp1
sodium dodecyl sulfate polyacrylamide gel electrophoresis evidence

attributeList.attribute: Originally the Sp1-QA construct contained an N-terminal GST-tag, which was removed enzymatically during purification; however, this left three residual linker amino acids at the N-terminus (GIL).

names.fullName: heteronuclear single quantum coherence spectroscopy evidence

attributeList.attribute: Spectra were also obtained for three different fragments of the TAF4N/C construct, which were almost identical to the spectrum of the whole construct, indicating similar structure and no interaction between the fragments; however, as the positions of the fragments were not given, these experiments were not included in the entry
